DOC.brief_summary: Open-label, single-dose, Phase 1 study to assess the absorption, metabolism, excretion and pharmacokinetics of [14C]-AKB-9778 in healthy male volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Absorption, Metabolism, Excretion and Pharmacokinetics of [14C]-AKB-9778
DOC.criteria: BMI 18 33 kg/m2 Significant cardiovascular, pulmonary, or renal disease
